actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the dumping of spent oil shale on any Federal land other than Federal land leased for the operation of shale oil recovery facilities and to provide for the recovery of damages for injury to the United States caused by the unlawful dumping of spent oil shale.

summary.text: Prohibits the dumping of spent oil shale on any Federal land other than Federal land leased for the operation of shale oil recovery facilities. Terminates the lease of Federal land of anyone who violates this Act. Provides for the recovery of treble damages for injury to the United States caused by the unlawful dumping of spent oil shale.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the dumping of spent oil shale on any Federal land other than Federal land leased for the operation of shale oil recovery facilities and to provide for the recovery of damages for injury to the United States caused by the unlawful dumping of spent oil shale.
